name: eleventy-base
description: This is the starting point for Eleventy projects

scripts.stylesDev: npm run scssDev && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.stylesProd: npm run scssProd && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.serve: npm run clear && npm run assetsDev && npx @11ty/eleventy --serve --quiet
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run assetsProd && npx @11ty/eleventy
scripts.staging:
npm run build && echo 'User-agent: *
Disallow: /' > dist/robots.txt
scripts.bump:major: bump major --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' --tag '%s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json
scripts.bump:minor: bump minor --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' --tag '%s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json
scripts.bump:patch: bump patch --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' --tag '%s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json

author: Martin Underhill
